EC970: Economics of Strategy and Entrepreneurship

I taught this course twice at the Harvard Economics Department, as part of the required curriculum for undergraduate economics concentrators.

- Spring 2025, course rating 4.86/5 (vs. department mean 4.09/5)
- Fall 2024, course rating 5/5 (vs. department mean 4.01/5)
